feed.title: [BIP Draft] Allow zero value OP_RETURN in Payment Protocol

entry.title: [BIP Draft] Allow zero value OP_RETURN in Payment Protocol
entry.summary: Toby Padilla expressed his concern about the mailing list and its moderation rules, stating that he was unsure if his message would go through. He acknowledged the desire to maintain a high level of conversation, but expressed frustration at being unable to respond to certain posts while others were able to post multiple heated arguments publicly. The author of the email, Peter Todd, clarified that everyone is on moderation in the mailing list, including himself. Todd's signature block and PGP key were included in the email.
